title: Himi 251
lyrics:
M.NG.
1.
’Oku fakatou fofonga,
‘A hotau ‘Otua;
Pea poto, pea ‘ofa,
Pea ta’engata.
2.
‘Oku fu’u fofonga ia
‘I he’ene ‘ofa,
Ki hēvani ‘i ‘olunga,
Pea fai ma‘u ai pē.
3.
Pea ‘oku fofonga mai,
‘A ‘ene ‘Afio,
Ki he kakai ‘i lalo ni,
Pea ‘alo’ofa.
4.
Pea ‘oku ‘ikai mama’o,
‘A e ‘Otua ni;
Ki ha’atau toko taha,
‘Oku kei mo’ui.
5.
He ‘oku tau mo’ui ni,
Pea ngāue foki;
Pea ma’u ‘a e ta’u ni,
‘I he ‘Eiki lelei.
6.
Ko eni, ‘a e koloa,
Pea mahu’inga;
Ke tau ‘ilo taki taha,
‘A hono ‘Otua.*
